response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your experience or meet an important need you have. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $150, which is below its market value of $200. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of this opportunity. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 150}
